name: Uncle Chuckles
text: I can attest. Its under new managment. My delivery was,in like 20 minutes after they quoted me 30 which was nice and the pizza rocked. Get the sesame crust. Its a winner

name: Fulton's Power House
text: 1st time having Cottage INN as we live in Cleveland so figured we give it a try while in Toledo. HANDS DOWN, one of the best pizza places! Philly cheese steak pizza with their homemade ranch as the sauce...OUTSTANDING. Deep dish pepperoni with sesame crust flavor...DANK! Breaded wings...BOMB! Thank you COTTAGE INN, well done!

name: Jenny Beach
text: THE BEST pizza in my opinion. My favorite place to order from! Super easy to order online, fast delivery time, quality food, and super reasonable prices!!! Love it!

name: Peter Doumas
text: YOUR PIZZA IS GOOD, BUT NOTHING LIKE STUBBORN BROTHER, WHO LITERALLY HAS REAL NY PIZZA. THEY MAKE THEIR PIZZA WITH REAL NEW YORK WATER USING A NEW YORK WATERMAKER.  YOU SHOULD LOOK INTO THIS.

name: Claire McKenna
text: Delicious pizza, nice staff, timely, and good prices. Our go to for pizza. Order from here, you won't regret it!

name: barneys soul
text: Omg I love this place got some apple-pizza with Carmel and it was down right the best and the staff was great and I think her name was caron she was a delight definitely coming back

name: Ashley Roark
text: Under new management! The new manager is super helpful and nice. Quick delivery time and the pizza was amazing. Definitely know that I'm going to be a frequent visitor!

name: Packy_ Shem
text: Best Pizza in town for a restaurant chain! Never once had a bad pizza, they always have coupons or deals going on too. Would highly recommend.

name: Dy'Yonna Jackson
text: Today was my first time ordering from Cottage inn and I must say I am very impressed that was so good and hot my family really loved it I can give you guy's a thousand or a million stars if I could thank you guys I will be ordering from you guys again soon.

name: Ricky Cabrera
text: the place is amazing, the foot is scrumptious and has the best gluten free options ive ever seen in Toledo!

name: Kristofer Savial
text: 1 of Toledo's Best Pizzas.  Deep Dish is Awesome!  The Garlic Cream Cheese Dipping Sauce is Fantastic! Full disclosure, I do not give reviews lightly.

name: Bryce Miklovic
text: This is the best pizza in Toledo! Service under the new management is also fantastic. Totally recommend.

name: Justin Hannah
text: Food was good. But Its like they're delivery drivers have to go get crack before they bring you your food. Step up on the delivery drivers.

name: lisharenee
text: From out of town and was staying at a hotel. It was 13 minutes away from them, but yet they were still happy to deliver at 11:45pm! I am picky when it comes to crust. They have an "everything" flavor option for their pizza crust, and it was ‚Ä¶More

name: Supreeth Raj
text: Awesome pizza in the town. Try and you will love it.

name: Davon Lewis
text: Website says 1am thurs-sun, called at 11:30 and get an answer followed with "thank you for calling cottage in sorry we're closed." Followed by a hang up. Cool story fix your times 1st and last time attempting to order from here.

name: Greg Deleon
text: This place is amazing the owners r awesome and so is the staff

name: Rachel Campbell
text: Excellent customer service, very clean restaurant, best Cottage Inn pizza I've ever eaten. Thank you for a great dining experience! Will definitely eat there again.

name: Patt Church
text: The pizza was fresh and not greasy. The staff were helpful. I ordered for a group.

name: Marsha Shultz
text: Had to have my food replaced three different days. So not satisfied. Will not order ever again.

name: Kyle Layton
text: I havent even received food from this company yet. Fighting woth their online ordering was a half hour ordeal inolving constantly having to reinput the order as the website kept jumping back to the home page. After finally completing the ‚Ä¶More

name: Arlinda ogren
text: Gross!pizza was under cooked and cold,whole family got sick! I never go back.

name: sherrie silas
text: I had it once. The pizza was very good and the driver was their on time. Exactly sooner then I expected

name: Sarah Anjum
text: I ordered two pizzas at 11:22am.  At 12:30, I called Cottage Inn to inquire regarding my order status.  The shop indicated that my pizza was out for delivery and they had no way of contacting drivers on the road.  They offered no apology for the extreme delay.  The pizzas finally arrived at 1pm.  They were cold and unappetizing.

name: Daniel Lieser
text: I waited 5 hours, called 3 times, and still never got my order. They said they showed up to my house twice yet when  they knocked, the person that answered said no one there ordered? I tried to argue with them and say that they must've ‚Ä¶More

name: Teena French
text: Excellent customer service, very polite on the phone. Delivery driver moe was great. Very kind! Will be orderiny again!

name: Anthony Strause
text: I've been waiting here for a carryout for 50 minutes. This betterm be some phenomenal pizza.

name: Daphne Charley
text: The pizza was very bad. The phone service was not good did not get my order right. I will never call back.

name: Karrilynn Johnson
text: Fast friendly service and the best pizza in town!!!

name: Hassan Bazzi
text: Pizza was good, service was good. Pizza can be better though

name: Michael Grantham
text: Big fan of the Buffalo Chicken Bleu and whatever the gourmet pizza of the week is

name: Fredrick Vollmar
text: They have good gluten free pizza and subs

name: Deborah Masse
text: Great new location, top-line product. An authentic Cottage Inn Pizza!

name: Tom Medsker
text: I don't recall going here.

name: Sammi Gunn
text: Charges you for sides & refuses to deliver.

name: Courtney Durham
text: Ok üçï good bread sticks

name: C DL
text: Rude customer service on the phone . I had a simple question and it was answered very rudely.

name: Mandy Gibbs
text: Second time I got my pizza with the middle bare because all of the toppings ooozed to the side as if it was turned sideways and I always order 2 cream cheese dipping sauce and pay for them but only get one this is the first time I got both but the pizza was messed up.

name: Truthful Believer
text: The owner of the store is very racist n so unaccepted of other cultures

name: matt zeides
text: Were's my delivery guy?

name: gary musser jr
text: Good pizza at a fair price

name: MadelineElizabeth Jones
text: Damn good pizza

name: Be Healthy
text: Great service!!

name: Chris Krieg
text: Y'all are whack crackheads Seacrest out

name: Mikey Mike
text: Food is great! Manager is really hot!!!

name: Erica Sanchez
text: The food will never disappoint.

name: Corey Kreager
text: The pizza was great.
